name: Angela Y. Davis
alma_mater: Brandeis University,  B.A., (1965) , University of California, San Diego,  M.A. , Humboldt University of Berlin
occupation: Activist, educator, author, Philosopher, International Public Speaker
notable_works: Are Prisons Obsolete (2003),Blues Legacies & Black Feminism (1999),Violence Against Women and the Ongoing Challenge to Racism (1992), Women, Culture and Politics (1989), Women, Race & Class (1981), Angela Davis, An Autobiography (1974),If They Come in the Morning (1971) and several others.
party: Communist Party USA (1969-1991), Committees of Correspondence for Democracy and Socialism (1991-currenty)
spouse: Divorced. Once Married to Hilton Braithwaite (1980).
